issue.title: Empty Module File
issue.description: The __init__.py file is empty, providing no module exports or documentation about the Stripe integration purpose
issue.recommendation: Add proper module exports (__all__ declaration) and docstring describing the Stripe payment gateway integration

issue.title: Missing Module Exports
issue.description: Project pattern #55 states that integration modules should have proper __init__.py with exports even if subdirectories handle specific implementations
issue.recommendation: Follow project conventions by adding __all__ exports for controlled public API and clear module boundaries

issue.title: No Module Documentation
issue.description: Missing module-level docstring explaining the purpose and contents of the Stripe payment gateway integration
issue.recommendation: Add a module docstring explaining what Stripe integration components are available and how to use them

issue.title: No Version or Author Information
issue.description: Missing module metadata such as __version__, __author__, or copyright information
issue.recommendation: Consider adding module metadata for better maintainability and attribution

issue.title: No Integration Components
issue.description: No actual Stripe integration code or imports present, making this a placeholder file
issue.recommendation: Implement the actual Stripe integration components (client, service, models) or document why this is a placeholder

issue.title: Dead Code/Placeholder File
issue.description: Empty file serves no current purpose and may be forgotten placeholder code
issue.recommendation: Either implement the integration or remove the placeholder if not needed

review.summary: This is an empty __init__.py file for the Stripe payment gateway integration module. While it poses no security or performance risks, it violates project conventions by lacking proper module exports and documentation. The file appears to be a placeholder for future Stripe integration implementation.

positive_observations.observation: File exists as part of organized integration structure following project layout patterns
No security vulnerabilities present due to lack of implementation
No performance issues as file contains no executable code

context.tests: No tests found for this module
